titles.title: Be Excellent at What Is Good (Romans 16:19)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Romans sixteen: nineteen says,
Romans sixteen: nineteen says,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
"Be excellent at what is good, be innocent of evil;"
"Be excellent at what is good, be innocent of evil.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And the God of peace will soon crush Satan, yes,
God will crush Him underneath your feet." (2x)
